data.title: Reave
data.text: Place the caster in target hex within 2 hexes. Then, deal damage equal to the caster's Attack to an adjacent enemy hero.

data.title: Unstoppable
data.text: Apply [R]Frenzy and [F]Fast to the caster.

data.title: Gank
data.text: Place the caster in a Cover Hex on the battlefield.

data.title: Disrupt
data.text: Deal 2[+] damage to each enemy hero hit. Heroes damaged by this effect can't be healed.

data.title: Dragon Punch
data.text: The caster's Attack actions do not require a target and hit all enemies in the AoE instead.

data.title: Icewall
data.text: Each hero hit cannot be targeted.

data.title: Chasm
data.text: Target a hex within 2 hexes. Push each hero adjacent to it 1 hex away from it.

data.title: Nature Reclaims
data.text: Draw 3 power cards.

data.title: Windblast
data.text: Place the AoE on target hex. Deal 2 damage to each enemy hit.

data.title: Twister Of Souls
data.text: Place the AoE on target hex. Deal 3 damage to each enemy hero hit and move them 1 hex.

data.title: Soul Scream
data.text: Deal 4[+] damage to each enemy hit.

data.title: Rampant Hatred
data.text: The caster gets +1 Skirmish Damage for each friendly hero in LoS of the caster. Then, the caster may take a Skirmish action.

data.title: Sinkhole
data.text: Place the AoE on target hex within 2 hexes. You may move each hero hit 1 hex. These heroes must end any movement effect in the AoE.

data.title: Mud Flood
data.text: Apply [S]Slow to each other hero in LoS of the caster and Push them 1 hex.

data.title: Guide
data.text: You may play this card only when none of your heroes are Exhausted. Move target Control token 2 hexes.

data.title: Refract
data.text: Copy target non-ultimate power card on the stack played by target hero. You may choose new target(s) for the copy.

data.title: Sudden Distraction
data.text: Discard a Lead card from target hero.

data.title: Kurumo's Judgment
data.text: Deal 3 piercing damage to each [M]<Marked> hero on the battlefield. Apply [M]<Marked> to all enemy heroes.

data.title: Topple
data.text: An enemy hero adjacent to the removed [P]<Pillar> is pushed 1 hex away from that [P]<Pillar>. Apply [S]<Slow> to that hero.

data.title: Cotlic's Oath
data.text: Place the caster adjacent to the removed [P]<Pillar>. If you do, the caster may take an attack action targeting an adjacent enemy.

data.title: Endless Disciples
data.text: Choose two: <Spawn> a friendly minion; Place target friendly minion adjacent to another minion on the battlefield; up to two target friendly minions cannot be defeated.

data.title: Haburat's Oath
data.text: The AoE must hit a friendly [I]<Illusion>. Deal <1 explosive damage> to all enemies hit. {(Explosive damage: You may remove 1 HP from a tower or nexus hit.)}

data.title: Deny Faith
data.text: Choose one or both: <Counter> target non-ultimate power card on the stack played by target enemy hero; The caster heals 3 HP.

data.title: Combustion
data.text: Defeat target minion. Then, deal 1[+]  piercing damage to each enemy hero adjacent to it.

data.title: Burning Scar
data.text: The next time target hero would be healed, deal 0[+] damage to them instead.

data.title: Lifesteal
data.text: When the caster damages an enemy with an Attack or Skirmish action, the caster heals for the amount of damage dealt.

data.title: Burning Rage
data.text: Apply [R]Frenzy to the caster.

data.title: Dodge
data.text: Place the caster in target hex within 2 hexes.

data.title: Blazing Edge
data.text: The caster gets +2 Attack. Damage dealt by the caster's Attack actions has piercing.

data.title: Grapple
data.text: Place target hero on target hex adjacent to the caster and apply [S]Slow to them.

data.title: Gathering Storm
data.text: Draw 2 power cards.

data.title: Bewitch
data.text: Defeat target adjacent enemy minion. Spawn a friendly minion.

data.title: Snowblind
data.text: Apply [D]Disarm to each enemy hero hit.

data.title: Shove
data.text: Push target adjacent hero 1 hex.

data.title: Trample
data.text: Move target adjacent control token 1 hex if it has no enemy minions adjacent to it.

data.title: Presence
data.text: The caster contributes 1 extra to Control value this turn. Predict 2.

data.title: Call The Pack
data.text: Spawn a friendly minion. Then, if you have fewer minions than your opponent adjacent to target control token, Spawn another friendly minion.

data.title: The Strength Of The Pack
data.text: Deal damage to target enemy hero equal to the number of minions in their LoS.

data.title: Dismiss
data.text: Target a power card on the Stack with cost 2 or less played by target enemy hero. Discard the power card and place it on its owners discard pile.

data.title: Time Warp
data.text: Move the caster 1 hex.

data.title: Redirect
data.text: Target an effect on the Stack played by target hero. Change a target of the effect with a new legal target.

data.title: Soul Swap
data.text: The caster and target friendly hero are swapped. Any effect on the Stack targeting either of these heroes now targets the other one.

data.title: Hurricane Strike
data.text: Deal 2 damage to target adjacent enemy. If the caster has moved 4 or more hexes this turn, repeat the effect on a different adjacent target.

data.title: Shard Storm
data.text: Deal 2 piercing damage to target adjacent hero and each enemy hero adjacent to them.

data.title: Migraine
data.text: Apply [D]Disarm and deal 2 damage to target enemy hero.

data.title: Nightmares Incarnate
data.text: Deal 3 damage to target enemy.

data.title: Recall
data.text: Place the caster next to their friendly Nexus. Then, heal the caster 3 HP for each AP they have and Exhaust them.

data.title: Lord Of The Many
data.text: The caster gets +1 Skirmish Damage for each friendly minion in their LoS.

data.title: Riposte
data.text: The caster gets +2 Armor. Deal 1 damage to target adjacent minion.

data.title: Slide
data.text: Move target enemy hero within 2 hexes 1 hex.

data.title: Twist Allegiance
data.text: Another target adjacent hero takes an Attack, Move, or Skirmish action and is considered friendly during that action.

data.title: Thorn Roots
data.text: The next time target adjacent enemy hero would be moved by an effect, that effect is canceled.

data.title: Crawling Darkness
data.text: Apply [D]Disarm and [S]Slow to target enemy hero.

data.title: Overflow
data.text: Draw 3 power cards. Then discard 2 power cards from your hand.

data.title: Skytear Drain
data.text: Target enemy hero's owner discards 2 power cards from their hand.

data.title: The Hunt Begins
data.text: Apply [H]Shapeshifted to all friendly Heroes within 3 hexes.

data.title: Unburial Rites
data.text: Remove any number of friendly [P]Pillars in LoS of the caster. Then, Spawn a friendly minion for each [P]Pillar removed this way.

data.title: Purge and Purify
data.text: Place the AoE on target hex. Each hero hit loses all conditions and loses 2 HP per condition they had removed in this way.

data.title: Soul Transfer
data.text: Swap the caster's HP with target friendly hero's HP.

data.title: Lure of the Tainted
data.text: When an enemy hero within 3 hexes gains [M]<Marked>, the caster deals <X>[+] damage to that enemy hero, where X is the caster's attack value.

data.title: Cooling Breeze
data.text: Heal the caster and each hero hit X HP, where X is twice the number of conditions on the caster.

data.title: Speak with the Spirits
data.text: Choose up to two: Predict 2; Apply [H]<Shapeshifted> to a friendly hero within 3 hexes; Apply [D]<Disarm> to target enemy hero.

data.title: Quicksand
data.text: Place the AoE on target hex. Apply [S]<Slow> to each hero hit.

data.title: Coup
data.text: Push target adjacent enemy hero X hexes, where X is the number of conditions on them.

data.title: Xotlan Hungers
data.text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies adjacent to the removed [P]<Pillar>.

data.title: Cull the Weak
data.text: Deal X damage to target enemy, where X is twice the number of conditions on the caster.

data.title: Indoctrinate
data.text: Move a friendly [I]<Illusion> on the battlefield 3 hexes. All friendly heroes can be projected as though they are friendly Nupten heroes.

data.title: Materialize
data.text: Place the caster on a hex containing a friendly [I]<Illusion>.

data.title: Akimo's Oath
data.text: If target adjacent enemy hero is [M]<Marked>, apply [R]<Frenzy> to the caster. Otherwise apply [M]<Marked> to the target. The caster takes an attack action against the target.

data.title: Dissent in the Ranks
data.text: <Manaburn> target enemy hero. If they have a lead card, swap that card with a face-up power card on them. {(Manaburn: Place a card face up on the hero from the top of their owner's deck.)}

data.title: Torn Banners
data.text: Choose one or both: Apply [F]<Fast> and [D]<Disarm> to target hero; Apply [S]<Slow> and [R]<Frenzy> to target hero.

data.title: Gulbjarn's Betrayal
data.text: If target hero has LoS to a friendly minion, they get +4 armor. They become melee and may attack using their armor value instead of their attack value.

data.title: Deserved Retribution
data.text: <Manaburn> target enemy hero. Deal <X lifesteal damage> to them, where X is the amount of mana they have spent. {(Lifesteal damage: Heal the caster by the amount of damage dealt.)}

data.title: Yami's Betrayal
data.text: Apply [M]<Marked> to target hero. That hero's LoS is reduced by 2 hexes.

data.title: Open Fire
data.text: Consider target friendly minion as the caster for placing this AoE. Deal <1 explosive damage> to all enemies hit. {(Explosive damage: You may remove 1 HP from a tower or nexus hit.)}

data.title: Discovery in the Deeps
data.text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. An opponent forms two piles. Draw cards from one pile and place cards of the other pile face-up on the caster.

data.title: One Man Army
data.text: The next time that the caster would take damage, they deal 2 damage to an adjacent enemy instead.

data.title: Akhuti's Oath
data.text: Deal <X+1 piercing damage> divided as you choose among any number of target non-minion enemies, where X is the number of face-up power cards on the caster.

data.title: Clear Mind
data.text: The caster gets +1 Attack. You may remove 1 condition from the caster.

data.title: Quick Shot
data.text: Defeat target adjacent enemy minion.

data.title: Crippling Precision
data.text: Target hero gets +1 Attack. When they damage an enemy hero with an Attack action or a Skirmish action, apply [S]Slow to that enemy.

data.title: Arena of Flames
data.text: Only adjacent heroes can target the caster.

data.title: Brutal Precision
data.text: The caster gets +2 Attack.

data.title: Not So Fast
data.text: Apply [S]Slow to target hero. Draw a power card.

data.title: Smelt Armor
data.text: Target enemy hero gets -2 Armor.

data.title: Through The Eyes
data.text: Apply [D]Disarm to target adjacent enemy hero.

data.title: Shelter
data.text: Heal another target hero for an amount of HP equal to the caster's remaining mana plus 2.

data.title: Charm
data.text: Remove 1 condition from target hero. If the target was an enemy, you may apply the removed condition to the caster.

data.title: Unfamiliar Terrain
data.text: Apply [F]Fast to the Caster. Then, apply [S]Slow to an enemy hero within 3 hexes.

data.title: Nourish
data.text: Heal target hero 3 HP.

data.title: Swiftness
data.text: Apply [F]Fast to the caster. Draw a power card.

data.title: Testudo
data.text: When the caster would lose HP, a friendly adjacent minion may prevent the loss and lose that much HP instead.

data.title: Shadow of Death
data.text: When target adjacent enemy hero resolves the next movement effect, Place the caster adjacent to and in LoS of them

data.title: Time Glitch
data.text: Apply [F]Fast to the caster. You may remove a condition from them.

data.title: Shattermind
data.text: Deal 3 damage to target enemy hero.

data.title: Impervious
data.text: Target hero gets +2 Armor.

data.title: Amulet Of Immovability
data.text: The caster cannot be moved by effects generated by enemies. Draw a power card.

data.title: Shield Slam
data.text: Apply [S]Slow to target adjacent enemy and deal piercing damage to them equal to the caster's armor value.

data.title: Granite Skin
data.text: The caster gets +1 Armor. Then, the caster gets +X Skirmish Damage, where X is their armor value.

data.title: Safeguard
data.text: Adjacent friendly minions can't be damaged.

data.title: Sacrifice
data.text: Heal another target hero 4 HP. The caster loses 2 HP.

data.title: Underground Tunnels
data.text: Target an adjacent friendly minion. Place it adjacent to another friendly minion on the battlefield.

data.title: Strength Over Pain
data.text: Apply [R]Frenzy to the caster. They lose 2 HP.

data.title: Doom
data.text: Target enemy hero cannot be healed. Place a card face up on that hero from the top of their owner deck.

data.title: Mindfulness
data.text: Additional cost: spend 3 AP. Ready another friendly hero within 3 hexes and activate them after the caster's activation.

data.title: Stone Barricade
data.text: Place a [P]Pillar in target adjacent hex that does not contain a token or a miniature. This [P]Pillar is a blocking element.

data.title: Exhaustion
data.text: Remove 1 condition from target hero. If a condition is removed and the target was an enemy, you may apply another condition to them.

data.title: Decree of Kurumo
data.text: Apply [M]Marked to target hero.

data.title: Release the Spirits
data.text: Remove all conditions from each hero hit. These heroes cannot gain conditions.

data.title: Provoke the Beast
data.text: Take an Attack action with target Outsider.

data.title: Seize the Initiative
data.text: Choose a player. At the end of the turn, they become the first player.

data.title: Strike Terror
data.text: Target hero gets -3 Attack.

data.title: Touch of Liothan
data.text: Apply [H]Shapeshifted to the caster.

data.title: Fool Me Once
data.text: The next time the caster loses HP, move them 1 hex.

data.title: Espionage
data.text: Your predict effects can be from any deck. Predict 2.

data.title: Dreams of Taulot
data.text: You may remove a friendly [P]Pillar on the battlefield. Place a friendly [P]Pillar on target hex that does not contain a token or a miniature.

data.title: Triumph of the Wild
data.text: You may remove an [I]Illusion in LoS. The caster gets +1 Armor.

data.title: Guerrilla Tactics
data.text: The caster gets +2 Skirmish Damage.

data.title: Reclaim Life
data.text: The next time target hero would be healed, the caster is healed for the same amount instead.

data.title: Whisper of Nupten
data.text: A friendly Nupten hero on the battlefield takes a Worship action.

data.title: Triumph of the Light
data.text: You may remove a [P]Pillar in LoS. Predict 2.

data.title: Barring the Way
data.text: When a minion would be spawned within 3 hexes from the caster, that minion is not spawned instead.

data.title: Vendetta
data.text: The caster gets <+X Attack>, where X is twice the number of conditions on target enemy hero.

data.title: Dance of Death
data.text: When the caster damages a [M]<Marked> enemy hero, if the caster has [R]<Frenzy> they get <+1 Attack>, otherwise apply [R]<Frenzy> to the caster.

data.title: Down to Earth
data.text: Remove all conditions from target hero and <Manaburn> them. (Manaburn: Place a card face up on the hero from the top of their owner's deck.)

data.title: Freeze
data.text: If target hero has [D]<Disarm>, reduce all damage they deal to 0. Otherwise, apply [D]<Disarm> to them.

data.title: Heightened Senses
data.text: Predict X, where X is the number of conditions on the caster. Draw a power card.

data.title: Breath of Life
data.text: Spawn a friendly minion.

data.title: Grasp of Graphite
data.text: If target enemy hero has [S]<Slow>, they cannot be moved with the next movement effect. Otherwise, apply [S]<Slow> to them.

data.title: Acrobatics
data.text: If the caster has [F]<Fast>, move them 2 hexes. Otherwise, apply [F]<Fast> to the caster.

data.title: Where Faith Falls
data.text: Target hero's conditions cannot be removed, unless they are defeated. Draw a power card.

data.title: Exhume
data.text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. Randomly reveal 3 cards from your discard pile, draw one of them and place the other two on top of your deck in any order.

data.title: Explosive Intervention
data.text: Name a non-ultimate card. Target enemy hero's owner reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

data.title: Vorhild's Oath
data.text: Choose one: Attack; Skirmish; Move; Worship; Lead. Another friendly hero adjacent to the removed [P]<Pillar> takes the chosen action.

data.title: Eye of the Guardian
data.text: The next non-ultimate power card that target hero plays costs X less mana, where X is the amount of mana spent by that hero.

data.title: Sight Beyond Sight
data.text: You may remove 1 condition from the caster. They can draw LoS to enemies through white lines and to enemies in cover hexes.

data.title: A Greater Purpose
data.text: Choose one or both: <Counter> target power card on the stack with mana cost 1 or less played by target enemy hero; Apply [F]<Fast> to the caster.

data.title: Biding Time
data.text: Predict 2.

data.title: Psychic Vampirism
data.text: When the caster damages an enemy with an effect of a power card, heal the caster for the same amount of damage dealt.

data.title: Mind Palace
data.text: Discard all face up power cards from target hero's card.

data.title: Skytear Discharge
data.text: When a hero moves through a white line, deal 2[+] damage to them.

data.title: Psychic Shield
data.text: Power cards' effects deal 5 fewer damage to the caster.
